= Simplyread =

Description

   A piece of javascript to remove distractions from webpages, similar
   (but much more simple) to readable. Download the source from the
   webpage, then install by running this:
cat keybind.js simplyread.js >> $HOME/.surf/script.js

   The default keybinding is ctrl-alt-r.
